snippet: A Texas power line company says it has found a way to make Texas’ electrical grid more reliable without costing customers more. But other companies are objecting.
lead_paragraph: A Texas power line company says it has found a way to make Texas’ electrical grid more reliable without costing customers more. But other companies are objecting.

headline.main: Texas Law May Short-Circuit an Advance in Storing Electricity
headline.print_headline: State Law May Short-Circuit an Advance in Storing Electricity
